title: Rolling bearing fault diagnosis method based on generative adversarial enhanced multi-scale convolutional neural network model
abstract: arXiv:2403.15483v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: In order to solve the problem that current convolutional neural networks can not capture the correlation features between the time domain signals of rolling bearings effectively, and the model accuracy is limited by the number and quality of samples, a rolling bearing fault diagnosis method based on generative adversarial enhanced multi-scale convolutional neural network model is proposed. Firstly, Gram angular field coding technique is used to encode the time domain signal of the rolling bearing and generate the feature map to retain the complete information of the vibration signal. Then, the re-sulting data is divided into a training set, a validation set, and a test set. Among them, the training set is input into the gradient penalty Wasserstein distance generation adversarial network to complete the training, and a new sample with similar features to the training sample is obtained, and then the original training set is expanded. N

Abstract: arXiv:2403.15483v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: In order to solve the problem that current convolutional neural networks can not capture the correlation features between the time domain signals of rolling bearings effectively, and the model accuracy is limited by the number and quality of samples, a rolling bearing fault diagnosis method based on generative adversarial enhanced multi-scale convolutional neural network model is proposed. translated_title: 基于生成对抗增强的多尺度卷积神经网络模型的滚动轴承故障诊断方法
translated_abstract: 为了解决当前卷积神经网络无法有效捕捉滚动轴承时域信号之间相关特征的问题，以及模型精度受样本数量和质量限制的问题，提出了一种基于生成对抗增强的多尺度卷积神经网络模型的滚动轴承故障诊断方法。首先，采用Gram角场编码技术对滚动轴承的时域信号进行编码，并生成特征图以保留振动信号的完整信息。然后将生成的数据分为训练集、验证集和测试集。其中，训练集输入梯度惩罚Wasserstein距离生成对抗网络进行训练，得到具有类似特征的新样本，从而扩展原始训练集。
tldr: 提出了一种基于生成对抗增强的多尺度卷积神经网络模型的滚动轴承故障诊断方法，使用Gram角场编码技术和梯度惩罚Wasserstein距离生成对抗网络来扩展原始训练集。
en_tdlr: Proposed a rolling bearing fault diagnosis method based on generative adversarial enhanced multi-scale convolutional neural network model, using Gram angular field coding technique and gradient penalty Wasserstein distance generation adversarial network to expand the original training set.
